name: Losed
description:
You wake up in a empty room.

Where am I?

Who am I?

As you move on through your journey you find somebody with the name of Mr.Losed, who is he? and why are you in his house?

This is just a small part of a big adventure.

-- Made By 410Games --

Follow us on Twitter for updates on all games -- @410Games

If you like this and would like more donate on this site.

Or go over to Patreon -- We really appreciate it - Thank You

-- MORE GAMES COMING SOON --

This was just a small simple project, if it gets lots of views then we will post it to more platforms and continue the series, and make it bigger and better.
